content.question: Xander can no longer stomach the taste of sushi after he vomited from eating a spoiled serving of it. However, the appearance of sushi does not make him sick. Which of the following best accounts for why Xander becomes sick upon tasting sushi but not seeing sushi?

choices.label: Latent learning, because sushi acts as a reinforcer.
Insight learning, because sushi acts as a reinforcer.
Biological predisposition, because this example illustrates taste aversion.
Negative punishment, because this example illustrates taste aversion.

content.answer: Biological predisposition, because this example illustrates taste aversion.
